org.beanio.builder
Class FieldBuilder

java.lang.Object
  org.beanio.builder.PropertyBuilderSupport<FieldBuilder>
      org.beanio.builder.FieldBuilder

public class FieldBuilder
extends PropertyBuilderSupport<FieldBuilder>

Builds a new field configuration.

Since:
2.1.0
